sectionText: This course helps prepares you to enter the sport industry as a media professional. Course materials cover the current state of the industry and emerging trends. Take a 5-day trip to Portland, Oregon to meet with industry professionals as well established and emerging sport apparel companies, stadiums, action sport venues, advertising agencies, and Portland Development. Potential visits include: Nike, Adidas, Under Armor, Columbia Sportswear, Patagonia, Portland Timbers & Trailblazers, and more. Students must apply and commit for this course by March 1, 2017 at https://illinois.edu/fb/sec/6760824, and register by March 4. There is a $1,300-$2,000 fee for this course.
